summary: This document is a Certificate of Authenticity of Domestic Records from AT&T, attested by Christine Carson, a Legal Compliance Analyst. It certifies that the attached records are true duplicates of original records maintained by AT&T, created and managed in the ordinary course of business.

persons.name: Christine Carson
persons.context: Christine Carson attests to the authenticity of records from AT&T, stating her qualifications and the process by which the records were created and maintained.

locations: 11760 US HWY 1, Suite 300, North Palm Beach, FL 33408
keyFacts: Christine Carson is employed by AT&T as a Legal Compliance Analyst.
The document certifies that the attached records are true duplicates of original records.
The records were created and maintained in the ordinary course of AT&T's business.
The certification is intended to satisfy Federal Rules of Evidence 902(11) and 902(13).
The certification was signed on June 17, 2020.
